VIII.iv.6.A.1.b
.
Possible Sources of Information About the Incident
Documentary evidence pertinent to the incident upon which the claim is based may assume many possible forms, including
medical records
surgical records
hospital clinical records, and/or
nursesâ€™ notes.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 6, Section A - Developing Claims Filed Under 38 U.S.C. 1151
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 6, Section A
